name: Hidden Dimensions 3
description: Hidden Dimensions 3 is a science-fiction themed collectible cards game offering over 500 cards, varied gameplay modes and challenges. Create decks containing spaceships, as well as various structures and actions to support your fleet.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows xp Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or equivalent Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: must support OpenGL 2.0 Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I've played the previous games a lot, so when I saw this was on Steam, I downloaded it immediately. Suddenly, it was 7am. I really should get some sleep rather than write this review.

Normally, I don't like card-based games, but this series is different. The storyline tied into it is so different and unique that it captured my attention. The combat system is very well-thought-out. The only thing I wish they'd change is to allow everyone to play all of their other games on Steam as well! Needless to say, I've spent countless hours on this game in browser before they put it on Steam.
